bike.description: S-Works Roubaix FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, tapered/shaped 1-1/8" to size specific lower HT, compact race design, Zertz, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works Roubaix, FACT carbon full monocoque, Zertz
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower stainless steel cartridge bearings, 20mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
New COBL GOBL-R, FACT carbon w/ Zertz, 27.2mm
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
